title: Mentoring the next generation of ToxSci authors—I Spy ToxSci
content: When you hear “ToxSci,” what is the first thing you think of about the journal? Maybe it is “the Society of Toxicology’s (SOT) journal,” or “they have fair reviews with quick turn-around,” or hopefully, “it has been my go-to journal my whole career, so I always publish my best science at ToxSci.”
